powers.name: Black Hole
powers.description: Creates a black hole at the location player is looking. This hole will absorb other Entities and damage them.

powers.name: Kurouzu
powers.description: Teleports the aimed Entity at Player's location and makes it unable to move or attack.

powers.name: Liberation
powers.description: Creates a black sphere that will absorb the surrounding blocks and then release them. The falling blocks that are created cause damage to any hit Entity.
